transArray.content: This Hanting is the most satisfactory Hanting I have ever stayed at. The little girl at the front desk has a good service attitude. The room is also clean and tidy. The breakfast is also very rich. After breakfast, you can walk to Beijing Chaoyang Station and take a bus. It is very close Very close, I will stay here next time.

Thank you very much for choosing Hanting among many hotels. Thank you for your support and recognition of the hotel. The hotel currently has a new breakfast feature. The robot can also deliver meals to the room. The hotel has a free laundry room. We look forward to your next stay.
